title: bl86fl
author: bl86fl
content: What happened: Satoshi Hero is accusing me of somehow cheating with Referrals and have therefore blocked my account permanently. Furthermore, they do not go into details about this matter. Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1041965Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2806310.0PM/Chat Logs: I tried contacting their support via e-mail, but did not get a response in 4 days. So I reached out to them in their Website-Chat today: https://i.ibb.co/C5D98Ny/satoshihero.pngAdditional Notes: I do have about 280 referrals on this Site. All I did was advertise Satoshi Hero and Monster on other Faucet Sites (PTC Ads on Cointiply and Firefaucet), nothing else.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: There's no proof that you have cheated with your referrals and similarly, you can't even proof that you actually haven't cheated with referrals. I don't think its something you can solve if they intentionally don't.I don't know how much commission you can earn from them but when you want to promote a site seriously, you should only consider the best reputed casinos. Few months back, there was another accusation which ended in no result/step taken from the team.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Maybe you don't have multiple accounts and didn't cheat but one or few of your referrals did!This is the problem with advertising referral links via PTC sites. You don't know who will register under your name and, unfortunately, most of them are known for multi accounting.I know it's your not fault but it is what it is.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Their decisions are sort of extreme, with some arrogance. This should have been a red flag when they suddenly blocked all Russian users without any warning at all and calling all of them terrorists. Quote from: ramzeskrd74 on August 10, 2022, 07:08:50 PM"Try to attract referrals from other countries. It's strange, why was it the Russians who were blocked? And where do you get such confidence that it was the Russians who were blocked? And if you are Russian, then why are you still authorized on this site, at a time when everyone was blocked?"I am from Ukraine, and therefore I can freely work on all resources without exception... At one time I attracted many referrals from the Russian region to satoshihero and satoshimonster through their thematic publics... And I learned about the blocking of Russian accounts by IP from the reviews on Trustpilot and the official comment from satoshihero and satoshimonster admins about these bans... Literally text: "Reply from SatoshiHero Jul 21, 2022Hello. We stand with Ukraine during these hard times. That's why we have blocked all Russian IPs on our websites, along with all accounts of Russian players, as we don't want to support the terrorist country. Hope for your understanding."
